title: Hildr.Answer.Second
body:
<<if $mimirMet is true>>
[[Hildr.Answer.progress]]
<<else>>
You must search for a solution in this field.
Come talk to me after you've looked everywhere.
<<endif>>

title: Hildr.Answer.progress
body:
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager askedHildr>>

Have you figured out how to cross that stream?

[[Monrjiall.Answer.Stream]]

title: Monrjiall.Answer.Stream
body:
What stream? 
I found a head that talks. 
It’s saying strange things.

[[Hildr.Answer.Okay]]

title: Monrjiall.Answer.aesir
body:
Yes, it’s saying something about an important Aesir God that lived with Vanir or something of the sort.

[[Hildr.Answer.Hoenir]]

title: Hildr.Answer.Hoenir
body:
Hoenir? I haven’t heard from him in ages!

[[Monrjiall.Answer.Hoenir]]

title: Hildr.Answer.Okay
body:
Right. A head that talks. Okay.

[[Monrjiall.Answer.aesir]]

title: Monrjiall.Answer.Hoenir
body:
Hoenir! Ha! I have you now, head!

[[Hildr.Answer.NotSure]]

title: Hildr.Answer.NotSure
body:
<<set $HoenirKnown to true>>
I’m not so sure you do...
